text:
SacI#BiH | 
dEqva i#va saviqtA saqtyadhaqrmEndrOq na ta#sthau samaqrE pa#thIqnAM || 
saM ~Mva#raqtrA da#dhAtanaq nirA#hAqvAn kRu#NOtana | 
siq~jcAma#hA avaqTamuqdriNa#M ~MvaqyaM ~MviSvA&hA&da#staqmakShi#taM || 
niShkRu#tAhA-vamavaqTa(gm) su#varaqtra(gm) su#ShEcaqnaM | 
uqdriNa(gm)# si~jcEq akShi#taM || 
sIrA# yu~jjanti kaqvayO# yuqgA vi ta#nvatEq pRutha#k | 
dhIrA# dEqvEShu# sumnaqyA || 
yuqnaktaq sIrAq vi yuqgA ta#nOta kRuqtE yOnau# vapatEqha - [  ] 22
